title: HelloWorld Post
snippet: Title testHere is a paragraph with some unordered list: item 1 item 2But we can also create ordered lists: ordered 1 ordered 2Letâ€™s do code blocksmy_str = "Hello "my_str += "World!"print(my_str)a="test"echo $a$ env |grep SHELLSHELL=/usr/local/bin/bashPYENV_SHELL=bashJekyll spaceship ðŸš€MathJax Check here for a lot of examples. Donâ€™t forget to end each line of multi-line MathJax with a double-space, otherwise, you need to put all code on one line between the 2 $$$$ a * b = c ^ b $$$$ 2^{\frac{n-1}{3}} $$$$ \int_a^b f(x)\,dx. $$$$\sum_{i=0}^n i^2 = \frac{(n^2+n)(2n+1)}{6}$$$$ f(n) =\begin{cases}n/2, & \text{if $n$ is even} \\3n+1, & \text{if $n$ is odd}\end{cases}$$$$ \begin{pmatrix} a & b\\ c & d\\ \hline 1 & 0\\ 0 & 1 \end{pmatrix}$$UML Graph Cool cheatsheet hereMermaid JS Official website is great ! Plus there is a Live Editor Added the following to _config.yml so it uses dark theme: jekyll-spaceship: mermaid-processor: config: theme: dark FlowchartsSequence DiagramState diagramPie chart
